groups.name: logback.access.tomcat
groups.description: The properties for the Tomcat web server.

groups.name: logback.access.tee-filter
groups.description: The properties for the tee filter.

properties.name: logback.access.config
properties.description: The location of the configuration file. Specify a URL that starts with "classpath:" or "file:". Auto-detected by default: 1. "classpath:logback-access-test.xml" 2. "classpath:logback-access.xml" 3. "classpath:logback-access-test-spring.xml" 4. "classpath:logback-access-spring.xml" 5. "classpath:dev/akkinoc/spring/boot/logback/access/logback-access-spring.xml"

properties.name: logback.access.local-port-strategy
properties.description: The strategy to change the behavior of IAccessEvent.getLocalPort.

properties.name: logback.access.tomcat.request-attributes-enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable the request attributes to work with RemoteIpValve. Defaults to the presence of RemoteIpValve enabled by the property "server.forward-headers-strategy=native".

properties.name: logback.access.tee-filter.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable the tee filter.

properties.name: logback.access.tee-filter.includes
properties.description: The host names to activate. By default, all hosts are activated.

properties.name: logback.access.tee-filter.excludes
properties.description: The host names to deactivate. By default, all hosts are activated.
